Hillsboro.The Reserve Vineyards and Golf Club:
The Reserve Vineyards & Golf Club is a 36-hole private and public golf club in the northwest United States, located in near Hillsboro, Oregon, a suburb west of Portland.
The award-winning club in Washington County opened 21 years ago in 1997 and hosted the Champions Tour major, The Tradition from 2003 to 2006. It also hosted the now defunct Fred Meyer Challenge from 1998 through 2002.
